p.s: The given scene from the movie The Hate U Give directed by George Tillmann Jr. in 2018 is about the main character girl named Starr and her boyfriend Chris having a little argument.
The scene is taking place in the middle of the film which is about Starr being faced by racismeracism in her teenage years.
The scene starts with Starr checking out her boyfriend Chris while he passes the school floor.
When he comes to her, he puts on his headphones on her head to show Starr his beats.
After that she confronts him with what he did the other day.
But Chris complains about her not wanting to get closer in their relationship.
At the end he starts dancing to his beats to get the proveproof of the other students that the beats are good.
Because of that Starr starts laughing at him.
